A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i feel like it was a very well crafted and heart felt continuation of the future of star wars. its what we need. its pushed the star wars world into a new place. rather the fan boys fall in and enjoy it like i did or not(im a big fan of star wars). Disney owns star wars this is their take on star wars its not you dads story. and i appreciate every bit of what they wanted to do.
